remarks: The image of an abelian group ` G ` under a group homomorphism ` F ` is an abelian group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
statement:
ghmabl.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
ghmabl.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` H ) $.
ghmabl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ghmabl.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` H ) $.
ghmabl.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
ghmabl.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : X -onto-> Y ) $.
ghmabl.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ghmabl $p |- ( ph -> H e. Abel ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .+^ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
